cTopology::Predicate

cTopology::Predicate Class Reference

Base class for selector objects used in extract. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class for selector objects used in extract.

..() methods of cTopology. Redefine the matches() method to return whether the given module should be included in the extracted topology or not.
